channel.title: CVE Feed for discourse -- rails_multisite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for discourse -- rails_multisite

item.title: CVE-2021-41263|2024-08-04T03:08:31.596Z -- discourse -- rails_multisite
item.description: rails_multisite provides multi-db support for Rails applications. In affected versions this vulnerability impacts any Rails applications using `rails_multisite` alongside Rails' signed/encrypted cookies. Depending on how the application makes use of these cookies, it may be possible for an attacker to re-use cookies on different 'sites' within a multi-site Rails application. The issue has been patched in v4 of the `rails_multisite` gem. Note that this upgrade will invalidate all previous signed/encrypted cookies. The impact of this invalidation will vary based on the application architecture.
